name: Frail Shells
description:
Shells fall from the sky

Like rain on a day that's just a little too cold

Shells shatter like ice

Against a pan that's just a little hard to hold

"You're dropped into a warzone..." - Destructoid

"But this isn't what it looks like." - Kill Screen

"The game isn't subtle about its theme, but it delivers it very effectively." - Boston Globe

"Frail Shells manages to have its cake and eat it, and that's quite a feat in a game without any edible cake" - PCGamer

★ I would be very very grateful if you purchased this game! It would really help me out! Your support is super appreciated! ; U ; ★

You can download it for free though if you'd like!: Just press [No thanks, just take me to the downloads] link above the price, once you press the download button.

Game - @fromsmiling

Sound - @DualRyan
